trans-unit.source: Manages the composition of parts.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce la composizione delle parti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified export providers.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe con il provider di esportazione specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'accesso a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> impostare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>su un elemento vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>

trans-unit.source: providers contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: providerscontiene un elemento che è .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified export providers and options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe con le opzioni e i provider di esportazione specificato.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the behavior of this container.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica il comportamento di questo contenitore.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'accesso a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> impostare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>su un elemento vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>

trans-unit.source: providers contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: providerscontiene un elemento che è .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog and export providers.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe con il catalogo specificato e provider di esportazione.

trans-unit.source: A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un catalogo che fornisce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'accesso a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> impostare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>su un elemento vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>

trans-unit.source: providers contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: providerscontiene un elemento che è .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog, thread-safe mode, and export providers.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe con il catalogo specificato, la modalità thread-safe e provider di esportazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object that can be accessed from multiple threads must set the `isThreadSafe` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>necessario impostare l'oggetto che è possibile accedere da più thread di `isThreadSafe` parametro `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Le prestazioni sono leggermente più lente quando `isThreadSafe` è `true`, pertanto è consigliabile impostare questo parametro `false` in scenari a thread singolo.

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è `false`.

trans-unit.source: A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un catalogo che fornisce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object must be thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'oggetto deve essere thread-safe; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> property to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'accesso a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per impostare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>proprietà per un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>

trans-unit.source: One or more elements of providers are .
trans-unit.target: Uno o più elementi di providers sono .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog, options, and export providers.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe con il catalogo specificato, opzioni e provider di esportazione.

trans-unit.source: A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un catalogo che fornisce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options that affect the behavior of the container.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica le opzioni che influiscono sul comportamento del contenitore.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> l'accesso a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> impostare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>su un elemento vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*>

trans-unit.source: providers contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: providerscontiene un elemento che è .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"></xref> that provides the container access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"> </xref> che fornisce l'accesso al contenitore di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The catalog that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to exports produced from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il catalogo che fornisce il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> accesso alle esportazioni prodotte da <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes the parts in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch"></xref> from the container and executes composition.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge o rimuove le parti specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch"> </xref> dal contenitore ed esegue la composizione.

trans-unit.source: This method is the primary way of directly adding or removing parts from the container.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è il modo principale di direttamente aggiungendo o rimuovendo le parti dal contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> will always maintain a stable, composed state.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>manterrà sempre uno stato stabile e comporre.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling Compose with an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch> is never necessary to start composition.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, la chiamata di composizione con un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch>non è mai necessaria iniziare la composizione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch>

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the Compose method whenever you need to make changes to the parts available to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, chiamare il metodo di composizione quando è necessario apportare modifiche alle parti disponibili in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch> can contain both parts to be added and parts to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch>può contenere entrambe le parti da aggiungere e le parti da rimuovere.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch>

trans-unit.source: Recomposition will take place only once for each call to Compose.
trans-unit.target: La ricomposizione verrà eseguita una sola volta per ogni chiamata a Compose.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> to include during the composition.
trans-unit.target: Diventa il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> da includere durante la composizione.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'istanza corrente di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare `Dispose` quando si è terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il `Dispose` metodo lascia la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata `Dispose`, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>occupata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre `Dispose` prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all exports that match the conditions in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono alle condizioni specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Implementations should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches.
trans-unit.target: Le implementazioni non devono considerare le mancate corrispondenze correlate alla cardinalità come errori e non devono generare eccezioni per le mancate corrispondenze correlate alla cardinalità.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the GetExportsCore method should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'importazione richiede esattamente un'esportazione e il provider ha non esportazioni corrispondenti o più, il metodo GetExportsCore deve restituire un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>insieme di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>oggetti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che definisce le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to disable transactional composition.
trans-unit.target: La transazione di composizione da utilizzare, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per disabilitare la composizione transazionale.

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the objects in this object that match the conditions specified by definition.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di tutti i gli oggetti in questa oggetti che soddisfano le condizioni specificate dai definition .

trans-unit.source: Gets the export providers that provide the container access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i provider di esportazione che forniscono l'accesso al contenitore per altri <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti che forniscono il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> accedere a ulteriori <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: Releases the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method may vary depending on the implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider> that produced the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento di questo metodo può variare a seconda dell'implementazione del <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider>che ha generato il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>istanza.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: As a rule, non-shared exports should be detached from the container.
trans-unit.target: Di norma, le esportazioni non condivisi devono essere disconnesse dal contenitore.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> will only release an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> if it comes from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> that was constructed under a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> context.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider>rilasceranno solo un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>provengono da un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart>che è stato costruito con un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy>contesto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: Release in this context means walking the dependency chain of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects, detaching references from the container and calling `Dispose` on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects as needed.
trans-unit.target: Versione in questo contesto indica che l'analisi della catena di dipendenze del <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>oggetti, la disconnessione dei riferimenti dal contenitore e chiamare il metodo `Dispose` sul <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart>oggetti in base alle esigenze.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> was constructed under a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> context the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> will do nothing, as the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> may being used by other requestors.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>è stato costruito con un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy>contesto il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider>non eseguirà alcuna operazione, come specificato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>potrebbe essere in uso da parte di altri richiedenti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>

trans-unit.source: Those will only be detached when the container is itself disposed.
trans-unit.target: Tali verranno disconnessi solo quando il contenitore è a sua volta è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> that needs to be released.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> che deve essere rilasciato.

trans-unit.source: export is .
trans-unit.target: exportis .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Releases a set of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia un set di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method may vary depending on the context in which the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> was constructed.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento di questo metodo può variare a seconda del contesto in cui il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>è stata costruita.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.ReleaseExport%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.ReleaseExport%2A>metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.ReleaseExport%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to be released.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da rilasciare.

trans-unit.source: exports is .
trans-unit.target: exportsis .

trans-unit.source: exports contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: exportscontiene un elemento che è .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object without registering it for recomposition.
trans-unit.target: Soddisfa le importazioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"> </xref> oggetto senza registrarlo per la ricomposizione.

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: La parte per soddisfare le importazioni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: part is .
trans-unit.target: partis .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during composition.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore durante la composizione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException.Errors*> will contain a collection of the errors that occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException.Errors*>contiene una raccolta di errori che si sono verificati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException.Errors*>
